tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BiometricData (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    biometric_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    biometric_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
    access_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
    user_id INT,
    biometric_type VARCHAR(50),
    biometric_data BYTEA,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT pk_biometric_data PRIMARY KEY (user_id, biometric_type)
);
